statements: SELECT * FROM firmware_updates ORDER BY update_date DESC
SELECT device_id, firmware_version FROM firmware_updates WHERE device_id = 12345
SELECT firmware_version, security_patch FROM firmware_updates WHERE security_patch IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM firmware_updates WHERE device_id = 54321
SELECT update_id, device_id, firmware_version, update_date FROM firmware_updates ORDER BY firmware_version ASC
SELECT firmware_version, security_patch FROM firmware_updates WHERE device_id = 10 ORDER BY update_date DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM firmware_updates WHERE device_id IN (1,2,3) AND update_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT firmware_version, COUNT(*) as total_updates FROM firmware_updates GROUP BY firmware_version HAVING total_updates >= 5 ORDER BY total_updates DESC
SELECT * FROM firmware_updates WHERE device_id = 5 AND firmware_version = 'v2.0'
SELECT device_id, MAX(update_date) as latest_update_date FROM firmware_updates GROUP BY device_id ORDER BY latest_update_date DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM firmware_updates;
SELECT firmware_version FROM firmware_updates WHERE device_id = 105;
SELECT * FROM security_patches ORDER BY patch_date DESC;
SELECT patch_description FROM security_patches WHERE patch_id = 20;
SELECT device_id, firmware_version FROM firmware_updates WHERE update_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM firmware_updates WHERE id = 1
SELECT firmware_version, update_date FROM firmware_updates WHERE device_id = 10 ORDER BY update_date DESC
SELECT firmware_version, update_date FROM firmware_updates WHERE device_id = 20 ORDER BY update_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM firmware_updates WHERE firmware_version LIKE 'v1.%' AND update_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT firmware_version, patch_description FROM firmware_updates JOIN security_patches ON firmware_updates.id = security_patches.id
SELECT * FROM firmware_updates WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, update_version, update_date FROM firmware_updates ORDER BY update_date DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_model FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'Smartphone';
SELECT * FROM security_patches WHERE patch_release_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_id, MAX(last_update_date) AS latest_update_date FROM devices GROUP BY device_id ORDER BY latest_update_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM firmware_updates WHERE update_type = 'critical';
SELECT device_name, device_model FROM devices WHERE last_update_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT update_version, patch_description FROM security_patches WHERE patch_release_date < '2021-06-01';
SELECT device_id, device_type FROM devices WHERE device_name LIKE '%Smart%';
SELECT * FROM firmware_updates WHERE update_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM firmware_updates ORDER BY update_date DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_type, manufacturer FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'Mobile';
SELECT patch_name, patch_description FROM security_patches WHERE patch_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY patch_date;
SELECT firmware_version, update_date FROM firmware_updates WHERE security_patch IS NOT NULL;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM device_logs GROUP BY device_id ORDER BY total_logs DESC;
SELECT * FROM firmware_updates ORDER BY update_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT device_name, device_type, manufacturer FROM devices WHERE purchase_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT firmware_version, update_date, security_patch FROM firmware_updates JOIN security_patches ON firmware_updates.security_patch = security_patches.patch_name WHERE security_patch IS NOT NULL;
SELECT patch_name, patch_description FROM security_patches WHERE patch_date >= '2021-06-01';
SELECT device_name, log_message, log_date FROM devices JOIN device_logs ON devices.id = device_logs.device_id ORDER BY log_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM firmware_updates;
SELECT firmware_version, update_date FROM firmware_updates WHERE status='pending';
SELECT device_name, manufacturer FROM devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT patch_name, release_date FROM security_patches WHERE is_applied=true;
SELECT device_id, log_message FROM device_log LIMIT 5;
SELECT device_id, firmware_version FROM firmware_updates WHERE status = 'pending' ORDER BY update_date DESC;
SELECT patch_name, release_date FROM security_patches WHERE is_applied = true ORDER BY patch_id ASC;
SELECT device_name, manufacturer FROM devices WHERE firmware_version = 'v1.2' AND last_update > '2022-01-01';
SELECT log_message, log_date FROM device_log WHERE device_id = 101 ORDER BY log_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT device_id, status FROM device_statuses WHERE status_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
